getLatestConfigurations.description: Return latest configurations for each sub-project for each runner

returns.description: The latest configurations for each sub-project for each runner. For example: {"sub_proj_path_A":[conf1, conf2],"sub_proj_path_B":[conf8, conf6]

getProjectPath.description: Get path of the project that has configuration iConfigId

returns.description: Path of the project that has configuration iConfigId
